title: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the fundamentals of web development from scratch. Master HTML, CSS, and JavaScript basics to build your first website.

videos.title: Getting Started with HTML
videos.description: Introduction to HTML basics - learn about tags, elements, and document structure.

questions.question: What does HTML stand for?
questions.explanation: HTML stands for Hyper Text Markup Language. It's the standard markup language for creating web pages.

questions.question: Which tag is used for the largest heading?
questions.explanation: The <h1> tag represents the largest and most important heading. Headings range from <h1> (largest) to <h6> (smallest).

questions.explanation:

videos.title: CSS Fundamentals
videos.description: Learn CSS styling basics - colors, fonts, layouts, and the box model.

questions.question: Which property is used to change the text color in CSS?
questions.explanation: The 'color' property is used to change the text color in CSS. For example: color: red;

questions.question: What does CSS stand for?
questions.explanation: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets. It describes how HTML elements are to be displayed.

questions.question: Which CSS property controls the text size?
questions.explanation: The 'font-size' property is used to control the size of text. For example: font-size: 16px;

videos.title: JavaScript Introduction
videos.description: Introduction to JavaScript programming - variables, functions, and DOM manipulation.

questions.question: Which keyword is used to declare a constant in JavaScript?
questions.explanation: The 'const' keyword is used to declare constants in JavaScript. Once assigned, the value cannot be reassigned.

questions.question: What symbol is used for single-line comments in JavaScript?
questions.explanation: Double forward slashes (//) are used for single-line comments in JavaScript. Multi-line comments use /* */.
